name: fullstackopenbackend
description: Backend project for the full stack open course

scripts.build:ui: rm -rf build && cd ../fullstackopen/part\ 2/phone_book/ && npm run build --prod && cp -r build ../../../fullstackopenbackend
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && npm run deploy

author: Vikhyat Prabhu
